comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Frederick Vanderbilt's steam yacht, "The Warrior," struck a rock off Cape Augusta on the east coast of Colombia, but the crew was uninjured and the yacht was not leaking. It had been pulled into safer waters, according to a short news item several weeks later, in the New York Times, February 24, 1914: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9402E0D91730E7...

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks Wystan, for the link to the article. I don't know if we can nail down the date for this photo, but we can certainly do better with a caption title.  We'll make the changes next time we update the record.
